data.message: i fucking love this. I'm so glad you made this, if you read this comment by chance just know that this song doesn't mean shit to anyone but you and your family. I'm glad for that. you told slim to shut up for a minute and let Marshall speak. I used to obsess over your mother hating songs because mine was no cup of tea... but when i got older i realized she was both my mother and father and the shit i did... i can never take back. Kudo's.
